values:
What song reminds you of me? And Why?

After you have done that, copy this and paste it into your Live Journal

::ATTENTION FRIENDS OR ANYONE WHO READS THIS JOURNAL::

-if you could ask any one thing of me whether it be a favor or advice what would it be?

-if you could do anyone one thing for me what would it be?

comment your answers and post this in your journal to see what your friends would do for you.

What a nice day today!!!  I think I'll take advantage of it before I go to work.  Joe called and wanted to go to the driving range so I think I might do that.  Haven't updated in a while just because I have been soooo busy with work and stuff.  But work is goin great, I love my job.  I'm makin pretty good money too.  And that is definately one thing I am gonna need.  Well, I dont NEED it but if I wanna move out soon, then yeah I do.  I am gonna be workin crazy shifts though starting next week...it'll be 330-1230am shifts all week, but I dont work on weekends so that is awesome.  Plus I'll get to sleep in everyday and that is a major thing for me lol.  Well, I'd better get goin, Joe's here and were gonna peace soo c y'all later.

Well...tomorrow is my first day at my brand new job at healthlink.  I don't think I have ever been so excited to go to work.  Or even so excited about anything really.  This is no fire department but for now it will definately do.  I think thats all i have for now, cause thats pretty much all im thinkin about.  Oh, and Ash, youre the greatest!  k y'all have a great day.

So I have a Medic job at Healthlink now.  I just got hired today....At my interview!!!  I kno crazy isn't it?  I'm gonna be saving people now...It's funny how things turn out isn't it?  3 years ago I would have never guessed that I was gonna be speeding people to the hospital for a living.  It's amazing...I'm really excited about it.  The pay is pretty good too.  Enough for me to get a place of my own soon, and thats what i really want.  This is just great cause it's just one step closer to a fire department.  Job starts next wednesday.  Definately not soon enough!!!  C-YA
That is it.  I've had enough of this crap, I'm done with YOU

Hey y'all.  Yep, it's been a while.  So much has been goin on!!  Well, not really, I am just lazy and didn't feel like updating lol.  But anyways, here I am.  So, I registered for Dodgeball yesterday, so everyone that's on the team, just a reminder, the tourney is Saturday, March 5 from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., and we might have to wear Team colors so if anyone has any ideas.....our team name is definately THE FAT KIDS.  We'll have them all fooled.  So this weekend I am going to 2 concerts and I didn't have to pay for either of them!!  On Saturday night, I'm going to see hot hot heat at St. Andrew's with the American Eagle Managment, and they totally bought my ticket for me!!  And then, the following monday I'm truckin down to Cleveland to the House Of Blues to see Flogging Molly, and that will be an incredible show, let me tell you...I'm Stoked!!  Well, That's about all I have for ya now, I think, but Everyone have a great day and...Winners don't do drugs!

If you read this,

even if i don't speak to you often,

you must post a memory of me.

It can be anything you want, it can be good or bad,

just so long as it happened.

Then post this to your journal. See what people remember about you

So I got the results back from my test that I took and I passed!!!!  I worked sooooo hard to pass this test and it happened...its all over...IM DONE!!!  yay!  I mean sure maybe I'll take some classes here and there to better my learning on certain things but I am no longer obligated to take a class....SWEET.  

Anyhow, our last soccer game was last night.  We had to play the best team in the league, and considering that we are the worst team in the league it would be a long night.  But it wasn't that bad, sure we lost but not by much, the score was only 11-9...I kno very high scoring game.  I did awesome, almost ended up with a hat trick but the goalie had a lucky save.

......

......

...Dude how can you get writer's block on a journal?

So, I guess Dane Cook is tomorrow...that should be a lot of fun, too bad I'm not goin.  Oh well, it doesn't break my heart.  Taking Back Sunday is comin into town soon and I would just love to go see them so I think I'm gonna look into gettin tickets...anybody interested in going?  Prolly gonna be at St. Andrew's.  I'll find out when...oh okay here it is...They are playing with Jimmy Eat World and it's at the State Theatre on April 11, so there ya go, if any of you wanna go with me let me kno.  Doors open at 6 p.m.

So there are a few of you out there that I haven't seen in a while and that sux so we should try to find time to hang out.  I know...the words "find time" kinda suck at this point cause it seems like everybody is busy...including myself, just because I dont have school doesnt mean im not busy....it's career time.  Okay well, that's all i needed to say pretty much so everybody have a good day and.....umm......bye?

If you woke up and I was in bed with you, what would be your first thought?
(Now post this in your LJ and find out what mine would be.)
Who cares about Valentine's Day!!!  St. Patty's Day doesn't get here soon enough!!

What's up, y'all?  I just got home from work a little while ago, and it actually wasn't that bad today, I don't have a problem with anybody that works there, except for maybe Bruce, that boy needs to take a freakin shower, seriously, it has gotten to the point of toxic.  Anywho, went out to Eastern yesterday to go see Amy, which was not planned at all, she asked if i wasnted to come out, as kind of a joke, and I was like "I got nothin to do here, sure" So I went out and I was really happy to see her cause I missed her much and hadn't seen her in like meeyuns.  Finally met her roommate, and she ended up bein really cool, I didn't talk to her much cos she had to go do somethin with her sis or whatever but yeah, Amy and I went to Fazoli's to eat which was a lot of fun, and then the fun continued on to the dollar store and we got a bouncy ball maker kit, paint by numbers, and a 3D Picture Maker thing.  Man, who knew the dollar store didn't accept credit cards lol.  So we went back to the dorm to make bouncy balls and whatnot and ended up talkin for a while, which was great and well needed for me...i hope u feel the same way, too.  BTW I hope you are feeling better today.  So anyway, After i left Eastern I got on 94 and i was seriously cruisin at like 100, I was flyin, no cops in sight, I made it to the bowling alley in great time.  And I told everybody that I was the worst bowler of all time and they didnt believe me, so i had to emphasize the fact that i suck at bowling, and I bowled extra horrible, It was fun though, until my mom and I clashed heads for a bit, things are finally starting to cool off between us, which is good.  But that's all I have for now pretty much.  TTYL

Have you ever listened to a song, and the lyrics were sooo deep that the song made you think about a situation that you are in or a relationship that you once were in and you got really depressed about it?  Well, I'm listening to a song right now called "Your Own Disaster" by Taking Back Sunday and it is doing just that.

~Nick

Ask five questions.

Any five.

No matter how personal, private, or random.

I have to answer them honestly.
I have to answer them all.

I kno I'm gonna hate myself for this one later but o well lol

[01] Reply with your name and I will write something about you.
[02] I will then tell what song(s) remind me of you.
[03] Next, I will tell you who you remind me of, celebrity/animated or otherwise.
[04] Last, I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
[05] Put this in your journal

Most important test of my life today....wish me luck

I just wanna apologize to anybody that I have been sorta mean to or have been avoiding at all...I promise I'm not doing it on purpose.  I have a medic test on wed and I am stressing out about it cause its pretty much the most important test I have to take so far....I kno that's a bad excuse but thats the truth....after this test I promise that I'll cheer up and I'm trying my best to be good now...I just wanna ask y'all to bear with me untill wednesday and it'll all be done.  I have been studying my ass off for it so that's pretty much the reason why i have disappeared from most of you.  Having said that, most of you will be getting phone calls from me very soon cause i miss the people I dont get to see at all....some more than others though lol.  Okay everybody....back to the books.

Post a comment with a memory of me.
It can be anything you want.
Then post this in your journal.
See what people remember about you
I keep living too much in the past, and it's hurting my present and future...this sucks.

Hey everybody, sorry havent been updating, but here I am....yes I'm sure you're sooo excited about it.  I have been really sick these past couple of days....running about a 103.7 degree temp...yeah it sucked...but hey, im doin good now.  Thanks to the only person that helped take care of me...you kno who you are.  But I was kinda bummed cause i didnt play soccer tonight...i kno i was feelin good but not good enough to run around for an hour and a half straight.  So i had a talk with my good friend Mr. Mattern of the Dearborn Fire department and he suggests that I get a job as a paramedic before I get on a Fire department, I think I might take his advice...I kno that i have come very far but I am only 19 years old and I should take things slow, and jumping on a fire department at 19 is pretty unheard of so  i think I'll slow down and take the experience first....plus if I am a medic first, it will look good on resumes.  Speaking of fire departments, I checked out Scottsdale, Arizona, and their department is hiring 30 guys within the next year and a half so I'm gonna look more into that....I would love to live in Arizona, it would be much better than Michigan.  Other than that, things are goin very well right now, I'm pretty happy, I hope you all are doing good too.  O and by the way, Amy havent heard from you in a while, you still alive?  You said you were gonna call me back the other day and you never did...That made me a sad panda.  Anywho.....I'm off

By the way, Now all of my entries will include a movie quote randomly selected by yours truly, in hopes of keeping my journal more exciting.  

Tonight's quote is from Ed from the movie "Shaun of the Dead"

"I'm not gonna say, ya know, there's plenty more fish in the sea, I'm not gonna say if you love her let her go, and I'm not gonna bombard you with cliches, but what I will say is this....It's not the end of the world."

Are You Gonna Be My Girl by Jet
"So 1, 2, 3, take my hand and come with me Because you look so fine And i really wanna make you mine" You impressed almost everyone in 2004 - and surprised yourself.

Today wasn't too eventful, didn't do much...was supposed to hang out with Amy but she sorta called me a little later than she said she would....about 4 hours later to be precise. lol it's cool Amy I dont really care.  Just kinda wish i didnt waste the day waiting for a phone call that didnt happen.  Anyways, got a soccer game tonight, hope all goes well....apparently the team that we are playing is really good but we shall see.  So I guess I pissed a certain someone off but I don't really care cause he is being stupid about it.  And if I find out that he is talking shit about me behind my back again, I'm gonna give him something to worry about, that's a promise...if it's one thing I can't stand, it's little punks like him that think they can kick everybodys ass and start talking shit about them.....BEHIND THEIR BACK....you got something to say dude i'm not goin anywhere...pay a visit.  That's all i got to say.

So I just got a call from the Farmington Hills Fire Department and They said they looked over my resume and they said it was impressive and they want to give me an oral interview but first I have to take the Physical agility test, which should be no problem...I hope I will be in good health.  I was waiting on word from Port Huron FD but I think they are screwin me over cause I havent heard anything from them in like 2 weeks and I should have heard something like a week ago....o well....i think i would prefer a job Farmington Hills FD anyways cause its closer to home.  But Im still throwing in Apps like everywhere and I am really bustin my ass to get into Dearborn but as of right now I don't think its gonna happen.  I'm pretty sure that Mattern will get into Dearborn and I am hopin that he will, good luck buddy.  Okay Im off.

By the way, sorry about not getting ur call yesterday, Amy....I'll hit u up later on

So today is a snow day....I guess if I went to school that would mean something, but well....it doesnt.  I have to go to work like every other day....snow or not.  Oh well.  So last night was a lot of fun, taco and I went sledding up at ford field and we saw a bunch of other people up there.  We ran into hoffman and her friend and hung out there with them for a while...playin king of the hill and whatnot, then we hit up starbucks and then we dropped ashley's friend off then we went back to Taco's and watched Boondock Saints.  I love that movie sooooo much, has to be my new favorite.  Today is gonna be kinda lame cause after work I dont have anything to do so hopefully that has some unexpected turn of events.  Okay thats pretty much all i had so now its time for work...its only till 5 so thats ok.  peace
It took me so long to realize what's important....but I think I finally have...

Don't worry I didn't die, just didn't really feel like updating for a while....oh well.  So today is New Years Eve, probly gonna go to Chicago to a party that a friend of mine is having but I dunno if I'll feel like goin, cause there are a few parties around here that should be a lot of fun plus I might have some people come over here, so we'll see what happens.  I'm not too worried about it, I just wanna make sure that I have a spot in the pub tomorrow to watch the Michigan game.  James and I might be goin to the Irish league to watch the game, and that is a great time let me tell you.  So I hope everybody had a good Christmas, mine was pretty good, the family got together and that's always promising, and it was a good time.  This week sucked out loud because of the fact that I had to work all of it, same thing with the week before that, too.  It's all good though I guess because I made meeyuns.  Last night was a lot of fun, I went over Tacos house and he bought DDR for XBOX and he got his whole family hooked on the game.  It was me, Joe, Dan, his dad and mom and his five year old coisin, Paige.  She was the cutest thing I had ever seen.  She did not wanna stop playing.  It was a lot of fun cause I had never really hung out with Joes parents and his brother, we were gonna play pool but I am glad we just hung out there and played DDR and talked.  I just have one more thing to add.....Napoleon Dynamite is the single funniest movie I have ever seen.  It's....amazing....it's incredible.

Well, thats it...I am now a certified firefighter/paramedic.  I am quite proud of myself, didn't think I would make it this far.  I'll be honest, there were times where it just got too hard and i thought about quitting...but ya kno what...I'm glad I didn't cause finally at the end, I got to feel the real meaning of what I was shooting for, and it is the best feeling i have ever had and i feel great.  It didn't hit me until the graduation ceremony when I was called up on stage and I was shaking hands with all of my instructors and cheifs of different cities, and my instructor, Mr. Woods, who is a detroit firefighter,  and he said to me that he was proud of me...i had to hold back a tear because right then and there i knew that i busted my ass for almost two years straight because i wanted something bad enough that i would devote my life to it and finally i was done.  It feels soo good to accomplish something thats very important to you...I just wanna say thanks to everybody who supported me and kept me strong and put up with my devotion to my career over the past couple of years, without you guys, i kno i wouldnt have made it.

ok y'all listen up....this friday I am having a graduation ceremony for my fire academy at 7:30 at my academy on ford road and venoy and it would mean a lot to me if you were there to see me become a firefighter so if ya got any questions.....313-320-0799...there it is....hope to see you all there.

~Nick

Howdy y'all, yeah so its like 2:30 and I just got home, awesome.  It was a fun night, I had to work tonight but it was with Julie so it's automatically an awesome night, we were pretty busy but at close Julie put in Kill Bill and we watched that on the store's plasma.  After that Julie and I went to T.G.I.Fridays cause she used to work there and she knows everybody there and we totally got hooked up, I wish I coulda drank a little more but I had to drive, go resposible me.  It is soooo much fun hangin out with Jules, she is one of the coolest girls that i know and I would totally hang out with her anytime.  But sahe likes to party, she always asks me to go to the bar or to some party or somethin, i dont kno how she does it.  But enough about that....looks like Scotty got the death penalty, serves him right, he deserves to burn...sorry but i just have something against people who murder their wife who happens to be carrying a baby, they should put him in front of a firing squad, or better yet just give him papercuts till he bleeds to death, ok thats a little colorful lol.  So i finally got all my christmas shopping done, spent a lot of money, and plus i gotta pay for soccer, i am just getting drained...but its ok, the money is not going to waste so thats good, plus i will hopefully be getting christmas money to kinda balance it out, we'll see.  Lets see, what else should i talk about....still no word on Port Huron FD but it's early yet....im just getting really excited about it cause thats where i am most likely gona get a job, and I am very very happy about that.  I am finally feeling good about things now, feeling more confident(geez sounds like a viagra commercial), but yeah im finally feeling how i want to, im not bummed, not lonely, not worried, things are goin great right now....i dont kno how long this will go on for but you can be sure that I am gonna preserve this moment.  Got the fire academy graduation ceremony this weekend on saturday at 7 pm so if any of y'all wanna come see me graduate let me know, i would love to see you there.  But thats about all i got for now and i gotta sleep sometime so.....night.

We lead two different lives...and yet, they are somewhat the same.  You're right, how can that be?  Well the answer to that question is, I have no idea.  I guess it's not totally abnormal.  We both act the same, we both conduct our feelings the same way, just toward different people.  I must say, though, your life seems like it can get confusing at times....but you make it that way and besides, tell me who's life doesn't get confusing, it's everywhere, confusion that is.  Sometimes, speaking in riddles is the only way one knows how to communicate with someone.  There are things that I need to say to you but I just can't.  Is it fear?  Well, that seems like the most logical explaination.  I am always prepared to tell you but when i see you it just stays on the tip of my tongue and goes nowhere else.  Will I find the guts to tell you one day?  Yeah probly.  In the near future?  Could be.  Now?  Im scared to death.

Well, woke up bright and early this morning at 6 to take my mom to work. That got her pretty pissed.  Oh well, what r ya gonna do?  Now its like 8:15 and I can't go back to sleep cause I gotta wake up at 9 anyways so I might as well stay up.  It really didn't help the fact that I went to bed at about 3 in the morning so yeah, I have a feeling that today is gonna be a rough day.  First I gotta get tags on my car, then I gotta clean up the house, then later on Im supposed to hang out with Sara, then I guess Im supposed to go to Clutch tonight with Blake, Courtney, James, Ashley, and Kelly.  But I also wanna make it out to the league and get a little tipsy with my fellow Irish, we'll see what happens.  So my mom got a digital picture printer and I hooked it up and it's pretty sweet....but we didn't need a digital picture printer, we need a regular printer, that's a little more important, but o well, I guess she got a good deal on it....she made it sound like she bought it off the black market...hhmmmm.  Ahh crap I just remembered I gotta go to the bank today....MAN so much to do and so little time to do it in.....oh well maybe I just won't clean up the house...I can't do everything..lol yeah then my mom would be REAL pissed...and I don't need to hear her complaining all day...that's just not fun.  OOO yeah and I gotta ask, I wanna start up an indoor soccer team for next season so if there are any of you who wanna play, I don't care how good or bad you are, it's not gonna be competitive, it's just gonna be coed.  I would rather start up a team with a bunch of friends than play on a team with a buch of people i don't kno.  So yeah that's pretty much all I had to say.  Peace

Nice Guys Finish Last....

How many times have you heard the phrase "nice guys finish last" ? You probably can't even count how many times you've heard some frustrated guy say this. You might even say this yourself quite frequently. So, what is it about "Nice Guys" that cause their hearts to get stomped on by women and people in general? I'm going to help explain this as clearly as possible.

First, it is NOT the fact that a guy is "nice" that makes him unattractive to women. Being nice is a great personality trait and there's nothing wrong with being a nice person. So many men are under the impression that they were "too nice" and that's why they got stomped on and stepped over. Wrong !

No more Mr. Nice Guy...

The first and most crucial mistake a guy can make is to lie to himself about the REAL reason that woman got scared off. Most of the time he is just too needy and attempts to build his entire existence and happiness around being with her. Guys...this is TOO MUCH pressure and feels suffocating. Men don't like overly needy women and women don't like overly needy men. So, how do you avoid turning into a clump of belly button lint stuck in some woman's navel? Simple...do NOT build your life around her or anyone else, for that matter. Have your own interests and activities. Build a happy and healthy life for yourself so that when you do find a good woman she compliments the good life you already have rather than creates or completes your life. Every good and quality relationship includes time away from each other and room for each person to be an individual as well as part of a couple.

Nice Guy Syndrome....

Another mistake so many nice guys make is to devote all of their time into doing things for other people to the point where they aren't taking care of themselves. Learn to say no when you need or want to say it. It's okay to put your own needs and wants ahead of doing things for others that they could do for themselves. If you don't take care of yourself first you won't be worth a damn to anyone else. How can you be there for that woman in your life if you don't see to your own needs first? You can't.

Love is a wonderful thing, and it's a precious gift you can give to other people. However, most importantly, you MUST love yourself first. Until you can genuinely love yourself you can't love another person in a healthy way. So many "nice guys" mistakenly believe that if they worship the ground a woman walks on and idolizes her that she will automatically return the same treatment towards him. These are what I like to call "Unrealistic Expectations". More often than not, these kinds of expectations go unmet and lead to pain, frustration and sometimes anger. These expectations are nothing more than premeditated resentments. This isn't healthy behavior and what it boils down to is a heavy dose of self inflicted suffering. Never set yourself up for this kind of disappointment. Treat yourself better than this.

Finally...if a man spends all of his time catering to the whims of others, how can he find the time to have a full and rich life? He can't, and his life is spent helping others to make their lives more interesting while his life becomes more and more dull and boring. He has little energy left for his own adventures and excitement and his love life suffers as a result. Women don't like boredom and stagnation.

The mistakes nice guys make are

-Being too needy 

-Unrealistic Expectations/Premeditated Resentments 

-Idolizing a woman 

-Living for everyone else but himself and becoming dull 

-Making his happiness and existence too dependent on his relationships with others 


If you recognize your own behavior in this list, you have probably blamed your "niceness" for hindering your relationships with women. Hopefully this article will help you to see and understand exactly where the problem is and what you need to do to fix it.

Here are a few things you can start doing right away to help you to stop making this mistakes with women.

-Start saying "No" when you don't want to do someone a favor. "Sorry, I can't" is just as easy to say, and the world won't stop turning if you say no. 

-Go spend some time with and on yourself...make your life exciting and interesting. Do things you enjoy just because you enjoy it. You deserve this! It's YOUR life! 

-Don't worship women. They are human, make mistakes and aren't perfect. They are just like you for the most part, and are no better or worse than you are. Don't treat them like they deserve more than you do. If you don't respect yourself women won't respect you either. 

You "need" food and water. You "need" shelter. You don't "need" any specific person to create your happiness and make you "somebody". If you feel like you "need" someone else to be happy then your feelings towards that person are NOT healthy. It's healthy to "want" someone to compliment who you ALREADY are, but NOT to "need" someone to define or complete you. 


In conclusion ... don't lose the niceness, lose the neediness

I found this on-line and I thought it was quite interesting...especailly at this time...now I am definately not a hypocrite...I have tried to be the nice guy at one point and can tell you firsthand that it does not and will not work...Hopefully this artical will be an eye opener to all of you guys out there who get walked on by women on a daily basis.  I also wanna know what you women out there think about this artical...is it true or is it just another way of guys trying to figure out a girl and be wrong about it?

~Nick
